rules.file:
<npcs>
	<npc id="Cuddles">
		<skin>
			<gender>male</gender>
			<skinColor>0xFFF38A</skinColor>
			<hairColor>0xFFF7D3</hairColor>
			<mouth>htf_normal</mouth>
			<marks>htf_cuddles</marks>
			<hair>htf_cuddles</hair>
			<shirt>fm7</shirt>
			<pants>1</pants>
			<pack>drhare</pack>
			<eyeState>open</eyeState>
		</skin>
	</npc>
	
	<npc id="Giggles">

			<gender>female</gender>

	<npc id="Flaky">

			<gender>female</gender>

	<npc id="Nutty">

</npcs>
